page.title: 14CUMBERNAULD HOUSING
page.content: A SYREET WHERE WE LIVE. SOME OF THE CHILDREN IN OUR CLASS LIVE IN MILLCROFT ROAD NEAR OUR SCHOOL, SACRED HEART PRIMARY. SIX OF US WENT FOR A WALK TO LOOK AT THE HOUSES IN THIS STREET. MILLCROFT IS A LONG ROAD. WE SAW: 6 STOREY HIGH FLATS WITH GARAGES UNDERNEATH: 3 STOREY HOUSES WIWH POINTED ROOFS: PENSIONERS 3 STOREY FLATS WITH FLAT ROOFS: CARBRAIN PRIMARY SCHOOL, 3 STOREYS HIGH WITH A FLAT ROOF: 3 STOREY HIGH FLATS WITH FLAT ROOFS: 2 STOREY FLATS WITH GARAGE LIKE STORAGE AREAS UNDERNEATH. IN ORDER TO FIND OUT MORE ABOUT THE DIFFERENT TYPES OF HOUSES, WE ARRANGED A MEETING WITH AN ARCHITECT WHO WORKS FOR CUMBERNAULD DEVELOPEMENT CORPORATION.SHE TOLD US THAT THE HOUSES THERE HAD BEEN BUILT BETWEEN 1963 AND 1967.
